dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2878 IS: Great Lakes Fishery Research Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Peters (for himself and Mr. Husted) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To reauthorize funding to monitor, assess, and research the Great Lakes Basin, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Great Lakes Fishery Research Reauthorization Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of funding to monitor, assess, and research Great Lakes Basin
section.text: Section 201(d) of title II of division P of the Further Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2020 (16 U.S.C. 941h(d)), is amended by striking 2025 and inserting 2030.
